backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, artist profiles, artwork submissions, and purchase inquiries with access control enforced. Maintains in‑memory maps and exposes CRUD-style query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to the frontend files they modify, along with component dependencies and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend React component, page, and utility file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode, including OKLCH color tokens and global styling resets.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML root document that loads the React app by mounting main.tsx into the #root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup using TanStack Router with theme provider, global layout, route definitions, and admin route guarding.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesT: Admin dashboard table displaying purchase inquiries with artwork thumbnails, buyer information, messages, and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/admin/Submission: Displays artwork submissions for admins with image preview, status badges, and approve/reject actions.
frontend/src/components/artists/CreateAr: Form for artists to create a profile with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/artworks/EditArt: Form allowing artists to edit artwork details, replace images, and submit updates with validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking authentication and admin permissions, showing appropriate prompts or content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and automatic retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to complete their profile with a simple form.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtworkC: Displays a clickable artwork card with image lightbox, title, artist, and price.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryF: Filter component for selecting artwork category and sorting by price or recency.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkIm: Image component that validates URLs, handles loading and error states, and supports click-to-open interactions.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkLi: Fullscreen dialog-based lightbox for displaying an artwork image with close controls.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Purcha: Dialog form for submitting a purchase inquiry, with validation, success state, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Simple site footer showing copyright info and branding link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, logo, admin link, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper that renders header, footer, and main content region.
frontend/src/components/submissions/Subm: Displays a confirmation card after artwork submission with actions to submit again or view the gallery.
Form for submitting artwork including image upload, validation, artist profile checks, and submission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDashboard.ts: Admin dashboard hooks for fetching submissions and inquiries and approving or rejecting submissions.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtists.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch all artists, fetch an artist by ID, get the caller's artist profile, and create a new artist profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworks.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all artworks or a specific artwork by ID using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Handles fetching and saving the caller's user profile and checking admin authorization via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditArtwork.ts: Defines a mutation for editing artwork details and invalidates related queries after updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an identity provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMySubmissions.ts: Fetches artwork submissions created by the current authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseInquiry.ts: Mutation hook to create a purchase inquiry and refresh inquiry-related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitArtwork.ts: Defines a mutation for submitting new artwork and invalidates artwork and submission queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme colors, dark mode, and gallery-related utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing submissions and purchase inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays an artist's profile and their artworks, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Lists all artists with cards and provides navigation to individual artist profiles.
frontend/src/pages/ArtworkDetailsPage.ts: Displays artwork details, handles loading states, owner checks, lightbox, and purchase inquiry dialog.
frontend/src/pages/EditArtworkPage.tsx: Provides an artwork editing form with authentication, ownership checks, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a filterable and sortable gallery of artworks with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero, features, and calls to action for exploring or submitting art.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitArtworkPage.tsx: Displays the artwork submission form and shows a confirmation after successful submission.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image file to a data URL with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/gbpMoney.ts: Formats, parses, and converts GBP price values between display strings and minor units.
frontend/src/utils/imageFailureReason.ts: Validates image URLs and provides user-friendly error messages for load failures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, including schema version, feature list, architectural notes, and overall goals for the Z'art gallery website.
